page.title: 17Occupations in Warton
page.content: WORKPLACES Within 1m 17.65% Wide Travel 3.4% Carnforth 15.65% Over 80m 0.7% 2-5m 6.1 % Over 200m O.7% 6-10m 48.3 % Sea(Oil) 0.7% 11-40m 6.1 % Overseas 0.7% WORK & SECONDARY EDUCATION 36.6% of workers are in the professions, 11% clerical, 24% skilled, & 28% semi or unskilled. Education, Atomic Power Workers & Waitresses predominate. Other jobs include paper making, quarrying, driving, plastics, farming & others typical of any community in any age. 1985 is typical in that children of 11+ generally transfer from Warton to Carnforth High School, but 1 transfers to Lancaster Ripley C.E. School and 1 to Lancaster Royal Grammar School after appeal for a residual place.
